channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Qualcomm Prevails on Key Issues in Arm Suit
item.description: The ruling could mean Qualcomm doesn’t have to pay additional licensing fees.

item.title: The Unlikely Ingredient that Could End U.S. Dependence on Chinese Batteries
item.description: Batteries that use sodium could allow the U.S. to create a completely new supply chain

item.title: Harris is pounding Trump on fascism. Some Dems think that’s a mistake.
item.description: Harris has ratcheted up her warnings about the dangers of a second Trump term in recent weeks.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on BlackBerry, Tencent, Naura Technology Group, and more in the latest Market Talks covering technology, media and telecom.

item.title: How Trump and Musk set off the shutdown crisis — but got little in return
item.description: The past week provides a preview of what spending battles could be like in a closely divided Congress and with warring GOP factions.

item.title: Biden: Trump’s tax and tariffs plans are a ‘major mistake’
item.description: Five weeks after the election, the president took his sharpest swing at Trump’s policy plans.

item.title: Senate Democrats find many ethical lapses by Supreme Court justices
item.description: A 20-month investigation by Democrats on the Senate Judiciary Committee found that Justice Clarence Thomas failed to report jet and yacht trips.

item.title: Lara Trump drops out of contention for U.S. Senate seat for Florida
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump had indicated to Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis that he wanted his daughter-in-law to be appointed.

item.title: Congress also approved boosts to Social Security payments and disaster aid

item.description: OpenAI has run into problem after problem on its new artificial-intelligence project, code-named Orion.

item.title: It’s still the economy: What TV ads tell us about each campaign’s closing message
item.description: The final paid messages: Economy, culture wars and character.

item.title: Italian Privacy Watchdog Fines OpenAI $15.5 Million Over ChatGPT Data Use
item.description: Italy’s Data Protection Authority said that it fined OpenAI over its use of personal data to train its flagship ChatGPT service.
